topic.title: Medication Information Manufactured Material - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.12.80.17 Medication Clinical Drug DYNAMIC
code SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] originalText (CONF:7413)
originalText, if present, SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] reference/@value (CONF:7417)
reference/@value SHALL begin with a '#' and SHALL point to its corresponding narrative (using the approach defined in CDA Release 2, section 4.3.5.1) (CONF:7418)
code MAY contain zero or more [0..*] translation (CONF:7414)
